main.java.game

Class Game

  • Object
    • Component
      • Container
        • JComponent
          • JPanel
            • Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentListener, MouseListener, ImageObserver, MenuContainer, Serializable, EventListener, Accessible

    public class Game
extends JPanel
implements MouseListener, ComponentListener
    Class responsible for the starts of new games, loading games, saving it, and for ending it. This class is also responsible for appoing player with have a move at the moment
    See Also:

      • getLineWithVar

        public static String getLineWithVar(BufferedReader br,
                                    String srcStr)
                             throws ReadGameError
        Method checking in with of line there is an error
        Parameters:
        br - BufferedReader class object to operate on
        srcStr - String class object with text which variable you want to get in file
        Returns:
        String with searched variable in file (whole line)
        Throws:
        ReadGameError - class object when something goes wrong when reading file

      • getValue

        public static String getValue(String line)
                       throws ReadGameError
        Method to get value from loaded txt line
        Parameters:
        line - Line which is read
        Returns:
        result String with loaded value
        Throws:
        ReadGameError - object class when something goes wrong

      • simulateMove

        public boolean simulateMove(int beginX,
                            int beginY,
                            int endX,
                            int endY)
        Method to simulate Move to check if it's correct etc. (usable for network game).
        Parameters:
        beginX - from which X (on chessboard) move starts
        beginY - from which Y (on chessboard) move starts
        endX - to which X (on chessboard) move go
        endY - to which Y (on chessboard) move go
